pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: たとえ多忙でも彼は来るだろう。
lessons.english: Even if he is busy, he will come.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は多忙のため来られなかった。
lessons.english: She couldn't come on account of being busy.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は多忙のため来られなかった。
lessons.english: She couldn't come because she was busy.

lessons.japanese: 彼は多忙を極めていたので、自分で行かないで息子を行かせた。
lessons.english: He was so busy that he sent his son instead of going himself.

lessons.japanese: 彼は多忙だったが、それでも私たちを手伝いに来てくれた。
lessons.english: He was busy, and yet he came to help us.

lessons.japanese: 読書をする暇がないほど多忙な人はいない。
lessons.english: Nobody is so busy that they cannot find time to read.

lessons.japanese: 読書をする暇がないほど多忙な人はいない。
lessons.english: No one is so busy that they can't find time to read.

lessons.japanese: たとえ多忙でも彼は来るだろう。
lessons.english: Even if he is busy, he will come.

lessons.japanese: 読書をする暇がないほど多忙な人はいない。
lessons.english: Nobody is so busy that they cannot find time to read.

lessons.japanese: 彼は多忙だったが、それでも私たちを手伝いに来てくれた。
lessons.english: He was busy, and yet he came to help us.

lessons.japanese: 彼は多忙を極めていたので、自分で行かないで息子を行かせた。
lessons.english: He was so busy that he sent his son instead of going himself.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は多忙のため来られなかった。
lessons.english: She couldn't come on account of being busy.

lessons.japanese: 手伝ってあげたいが、多忙です。
lessons.english: I want to help, but I'm so busy.
